title: Ride
author: Lana Del Rey
lyrics:
[00:31.29] I've been out on that open road
[00:37.37] You can be my full-time daddy, white and gold
[00:44.75] Singing blues has been getting old
[00:50.68] You can be my full-time baby, hot or cold
[01:00.94] Don't break me down (don't break me down)
[01:05.92] I've been traveling too long (I've been traveling too long)
[01:10.62] I've been trying too hard (I've been trying too hard)
[01:15.58] With one pretty song (with one pretty song)
[01:22.47] I hear the birds on the summer breeze, I drive fast
[01:28.04] I am alone at midnight
[01:33.06] Been trying hard not to get into trouble
[01:37.35] But I, I've got a war in my mind
[01:41.94] So, I just ride
[01:47.30] Just ride
[01:52.86] I just ride
[01:57.61] I just ride
[02:04.07] Dying young and playing hard
[02:10.02] 
[02:12.93] That's the way my father made his life an art
[02:18.94] 
[02:22.08] Drink all day and we talk 'til dark
[02:30.21] That's the way the Road Dogs do it, light 'til dark
[02:37.45] Don't leave me now (don't leave me now)
[02:42.62] Don't say goodbye (don't say goodbye)
[02:47.81] Don't turn around (don't turn around)
[02:52.86] Leave me high and dry (leave me high and dry)
[02:59.86] I hear the birds on the summer breeze, I drive fast
[03:05.45] I am alone at midnight
[03:10.01] Been trying hard not to get into trouble
[03:14.47] But I, I've got a war in my mind
[03:19.22] I just ride
[03:24.39] Just ride
[03:29.63] I just ride
[03:34.82] I just ride
[03:40.67] I'm tired of feeling like I'm fucking crazy
[03:45.89] I'm tired of driving 'til I see stars in my eyes
[03:51.50] All I've got to keep myself sane, baby
[03:56.21] So, I just ride, I just ride
[04:02.92] Hear the birds on the summer breeze, I drive fast
[04:06.42] I am alone at midnight
[04:11.20] Been trying hard not to get into trouble
[04:15.69] But I, I've got a war in my mind
[04:20.46] I just ride
[04:25.76] Just ride
[04:30.65] I just ride
[04:35.81] I just ride
[04:37.92]
